name: Notion Travel Planner
description: Plan and Organise your next trip in NotionThis Travel Planner Notion Template is fully customizable to fit your unique travel needs.Features Includes: Keep track of flights and hotels details Manage your activities and places to go Packing list and task to do Track expenses related to the trip Keep all your future and past trip for reference Are you tired of trying to keep track of all your travel plans in multiple places? Do you feel like you spend more time planning your trips than actually en
features: Keep track of flights and hotels details; Manage your activities and places to go; Packing list and task to do; Track expenses related to the trip; Keep all your future and past trip for reference
